content: row - 37sts ear position markers row 12 p7 in yarn cd p23 in yarn cde p7 to end of row row 16-22 work 7 row stocking stitch cut yarn e continue with yarn cd as follows row 23 purl all 25 head back stitches onto the circular needle for now row 13 increase k12 kfb k11 kfb k12 to end of row - 39sts and cut the yarn before you carry on with the head top join the muzzle seam as follows on next page new born puppy pattern page 9 new born puppy pattern page 10 join muzzle front seam with rs together match the two nose seam markers then match the two muzzle front markers work back stitch to join the small muzzle front seam joining both muzzle front cast-on edges from the nose seam markers to the muzzle front markers edge see fig 1 join dotted line a to b turn out to rs the triangular nose should lie on the right side above the muzzle front seam see fig 2 remove both nose seam markers red markers join nose fig 2 find the centre of the nose cast-on edge then place it down over the muzzle front seam so that the nose centre point lies halfway along the muzzle front seam sew the nose down onto the muzzle with a strand of mohair yarn see fig 3 left eye lid b nose a nose centre muzzle front point marker nose markers fig 1 fig 3 new born puppy pattern page 11 new born puppy pattern page 12 body row 2 decrease k12 skpo k7 k2tog k12 to end of row - 33sts joining left side of head left side of the puppy facing begin at row 3 increase pfb purl to last st pfb - 35sts the stitch nearest to the left muzzle marker with yarn cde pick up cut yarn e continue with yarn cd as follows and knit 5 sts evenly along left cheek row ends to left-side corner of row 4 increase k12 kfb k9 kfb k12 to end of row - 37sts head back seam cast-off edge from the 25 sts on the circular - knit row 5 increase pfb purl to last st pfb - 39sts across all 25sts row 6 increase kfb k14 kfb k7 kfb k14 to last st kfb - 43sts joining right side of head continue to pick up across the right row 7 purl side of the head all onto the same needle as follows row 8 increase k17 kfb k7 kfb k17 to end - 45sts pick up and knit 5 sts evenly along row ends from right corner of row 9 purl pm at each end of row for left and right foreleg markers head back seam cast-off edge to right neck marker see fig 4 join yarn e continue with yarn cde changing to yarn cd as directed pick up and knit from a to b knit across from c to d
